statements: SELECT * FROM subscription_billing
SELECT subscription_id, customer_id, subscription_end FROM subscription_billing WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT subscription_id, MAX(subscription_start) FROM subscription_billing GROUP BY subscription_id
SELECT subscription_id, MIN(billing_amount) FROM subscription_billing WHERE subscription_end IS NULL
SELECT customer_id, billing_amount FROM subscription_billing ORDER BY billing_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM subscription_billing WHERE billing_amount > 100
SELECT subscription_id, customer_id FROM subscription_billing ORDER BY subscription_start DESC
SELECT subscription_id, customer_id, billing_amount FROM subscription_billing WHERE subscription_end IS NULL
SELECT customer_id, subscription_start FROM subscription_billing WHERE billing_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY subscription_start ASC
SELECT AVG(billing_amount) AS avg_billing_amount FROM subscription_billing
SELECT * FROM subscriptions;
SELECT subscription_id, start_date, status FROM subscriptions WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM billing_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT subscription_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE status='active';
SELECT customer_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT customer_id, status FROM subscriptions WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM billing_transactions WHERE amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT subscription_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM billing_transactions GROUP BY subscription_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE subscription_plan = 'Premium';
SELECT customer_name, email, start_date, end_date FROM Customers c JOIN Subscriptions s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, date, amount FROM Customers c JOIN BillingHistory b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM BillingHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE subscription_plan = 'Gold';
SELECT customer_name, start_date FROM Customers JOIN Subscriptions ON Customers.customer_id = Subscriptions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, date, amount FROM Customers JOIN BillingHistory ON Customers.customer_id = BillingHistory.customer_id WHERE status = 'Paid';

SELECT customer_name, subscription_plan, amount FROM Customers JOIN Subscriptions ON Customers.customer_id = Subscriptions.customer_id JOIN BillingHistory ON Customers.customer_id = BillingHistory.customer_id WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM billing_customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, subscription_plan FROM billing_customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, billing_address FROM billing_customers WHERE subscription_plan = 'Premium' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT invoice_date, amount, payment_status FROM billing_invoices WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM billing_transactions WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM billing_customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM billing_customers WHERE subscription_plan = 'Gold';
SELECT * FROM billing_invoices WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, amount FROM billing_invoices WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY invoice_date ASC;

SELECT billing_customers.customer_name, billing_invoices.amount FROM billing_customers INNER JOIN billing_invoices ON billing_customers.customer_id = billing_invoices.customer_id WHERE billing_invoices.amount >= 500 AND billing_customers.subscription_plan = 'Platinum';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, subscription_plan FROM customers WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, end_date FROM customers WHERE subscription_plan = 'Premium';
SELECT invoice_id, amount_due FROM invoices WHERE amount_due > 100;
SELECT customer_name, plan_name FROM customers JOIN subscription_plans ON customers.subscription_plan = subscription_plans.plan_name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, subscription_plan FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT invoice_date, amount_due FROM invoices WHERE amount_due > 100 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_history WHERE customer_id = 2 AND event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY event_date;

SELECT customers.customer_name, invoices.amount_due, payments.amount_paid FROM customers INNER JOIN invoices ON customers.customer_id = invoices.customer_id INNER JOIN payments ON invoices.invoice_id = payments.invoice_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 3;
